name: nurmilintu
notes:
not a single purl stitch! yay!

and hey - size is adjustable - you may repeat garter stitch and lace parts as many times as you wish.

*update july 24th 2018: there are now revised versions of english and finnish files.*

--

thanks to [elisabetm][1] now also in swedish!

thank you [mjinbarcelona][2] for the spanish translation!

maintenant aussi en francais! merci bien [lalie-78][3]!

also in italian! thank you [ilaria70][4]!

and now also in german! thank you [theolinchen412][5]!

thanks to [dashuta][6], now also in russian!

thank you [knittintin][7] for being my photographer, test knitter and joojoo-man!
